name: Fashion Star Life
description:
Do you have what it takes to be a Fashion Star?

Can you meet client expectations and truly "cut it" in your very own fashion studio?

From the makers of Fashion Star Boutique comes the newest fashionista experience from XMG Studio, Fashion Star Life!

Live the life of a Fashion Star!

***********

* Design outfits with the hottest styles and newest trends! *
* Accessorize your designs with 100's of options! *
* Meet the demands of your ever growing list of clients! *
* Add your own flair to your custom made designs! *
* Create your own personal look and style! *
* Sell your designs to unlock the newest trends! *

***********

Join the ever-growing community of fashion enthusiasts and let your creativity shine!
